text:
There will be no power supply in the following areas from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on February 17 owing to maintenance work at the Mallur sub-station: Mallur town; Panamarathupatti; Tirumanur; Parapatti; Ondiyur; Keeranurvalasu; Keeranur; No. 3 Komarapalayam; Ponparapatti; Ananthagoundanpalayam; Pazhanthinnipatti; Alavaipatti; Vennanthur; Nadupatti; Nachipatti; Minnakkal and Veerapandi.

Vembadithalam sub-station: Ilampillai nagar; Gandhi nagar; Thappkuttai; Sidharkoil; Idanganasalai; K. K. Nagar; Vembadithalam; Kakkapalayam and Magudanchavadi.
title: TAMIL NADU
